name: Yuch3n
text-about: As a multidisciplinary talent, I'm actively advancing towards the field of software development. My rich experience in customer service and project management has laid a solid foundation for my technical learning journey. Passionate about front-end development, I focus on learning Vue3.js and have applied SCSS and Bootstrap5 in personal projects. Furthermore, I've explored Node.js and Tailwind CSS, demonstrating my enthusiasm and potential in front-end technologies.
